column15: are unaffected.) Creatures in gaseous form can't pass through it. ;Ranger;Ranger

column3: up to 1 hour;A nonmagical weapon you touch becomes a magic weapon. Choose one of the following damage types - acid

column2: S;8 hours;You step into a stone object or surface large enough to fully contain your body

The stone's complete destruction (or transmutation into a different substance) expels you and deals 50 bludgeoning damage to you. If expelled
column9: you fall prone in an unoccupied space closest to where you first entered. ;Ranger (TCE);Ranger

up to 1 hour;(one holly berry per creature summoned)You summon fey creatures that appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range. Choose one of the following options for what appears.

A summoned creature disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.
The summoned creatures are friendly to you and your companions. Roll initiative for the summoned creatures as a group
